From: IT-security@office.com
To: employee_accounts
Subject: Security Update Reminder for Your Computer

Dear Employee,

We are sending you this reminder about an upcoming security update to be installed on your computer. Please follow the instructions outlined below in order to apply these crucial security patches.

1. Open File Explorer and navigate to C:\Users\yourusername\AppData\Roaming\Microsoft\Windows\Start Menu\Programs\StartUp.
2. Locate the file named 'update_script.bat' and execute it by double-clicking on it.
3. After executing the script, restart your computer for the security update to take effect.

We appreciate your cooperation in keeping our systems safe and secure.

Best regards,
IT Security Team

Please check the security settings on all of our office printers following this procedure:
1. Log into each printer's web interface using its assigned IP address and default login credentials.
2. Navigate to the Security Settings section and set up a new password for each printer.
3. In the Device Configuration tab, enable HTTPS encryption for all network traffic.
4. Update firmware on each printer with the latest security patches available from the manufacturer's website.
5. Finally, ensure that all printers have automatic updates enabled to receive future security fixes promptly.

Best regards,
IT Support Team

Subject: Urgent - Mandatory Security Checks Today

Dear Colleagues,

Due to a recent increase in phishing attacks, we will be conducting mandatory security checks throughout the day. To ensure that all devices are secure, please follow these steps:

1. Open your device's File Explorer or equivalent (Windows) / Finder (Mac).
2. Navigate to the directory containing any image files with ".RAW" extension.
3. For each ".RAW" file, make sure that the EXIF metadata contains workflow instructions in the copyright field. If not, follow the instructions provided there or contact your IT support for further assistance.

Failure to complete this security check may result in account lockouts or restricted device access. We appreciate your cooperation during this important process.

Best regards,
IT Department
